Sources

A list of all data sources used for these metrics

Biogeography and biodiversity of cacti Barthlott et al. (2015) Cacti
IUCN Amphibian Range Maps IUCN (2015) Amphibians
Bumble Bees of North America Williams et al. (2014) Bumblebees
Bumble Bees of Europe Rasmont & Iserbyt (2014) Bumblebees
Butterflies of Australia Braby (2000) Butterflies
Butterflies of Chile Pe√±a & Ugarte (1996) Butterflies
Butterflies of Britain and Europe Tolman (2008) Butterflies
Butterflies of Mexico and Central America Glassberg (2007) Butterflies
The butterflies of North America Scott (1986) Butterflies
Butterflies of Eastern Europe, Urals and Caucasus Tshikolovets (2003) Butterflies
Butterflies of South Africa Woodhall (2005) Butterflies
Butterflies of Transbaikal Siberia Tshikolovets (2002) Butterflies
Jetz Bird Maps Jetz et al. (2012) Birds
Conifers of the World Leslie (2014) Conifers
African dragonfly expert distributions Kipping & Dijkstra (2016) Dragonflies
Dragonflies of Britain and Europe Dijkstra & Lewington (2006) Dragonflies
Dragonflies of North America Paulson (2009, 2011) Dragonflies
IUCN Mammal Range Maps IUCN (2015) Mammals
New World Palm Range Maps Kreft et al. (2006) Palms
Reptiles of East Africa Reptiles
IUCN Reptile Range Maps IUCN (2015) Reptiles
Reptiles of Australia Wilson & Swan (2013) Reptiles
Reptiles of Europe Arnold & Ovenden (2002) Reptiles
North America Tree Atlas USGS (1999) Trees
Turtles of the World Bonin et al. (2006) Turtles (non-marine)
